candidates.name: Moemoea Mohoawhenua
candidates.why_elect: I am Tangata Whenua. My Tupuna have been here since the beginning of time. I was brought up on my Marae and at Omamari and as such will do all I can for my Māori and Pākehā people, and everyone else here, from the principals and values of Tikanga Māori.
candidates.why_stand: The main reason I am running for the Mayoralty is to say to my Māori people, especially our Rangatahi (Youth), that we are just as good as anyone else. We have the same mana (dignity). We can achieve our dreams and become all we are capable of becoming.

candidates.name: Jason Smith
candidates.why_elect: Being 5th generation local helps me understand the history and context of where we are and where we're headed. As the only current mayor in all NZ with an economic development doctorate, I am qualified to help take Kaipara to the next level. Already being mayor, I know the ropes.
candidates.why_stand: I'm passionate about Kaipara and want this place to thrive and prosper.
